attributes.action: Make Theresa May call for another general election due to recent behaviour
attributes.additional_details: Sign this petition so we can have another general election, and stop things like this from happening again!
attributes.background: Due to recent news, the Houses of Parliament weren’t able to address the issue of what had been happening in Syria, and Theresa may acted on her own behalf, in order to stop a chemical attack from happening in Syria, except it could have devastating consequences, for us and the people of our nation
